#Wins Above Replacemnt?

In this notebook we will be examining the advanced statistic of Wins Above Replacement (WAR) from the 2019 MLB season. 

A simple explanation of the WAR statistic is a numerical explanation of how many wins (or loss) a player contributes to a teams record.

We will examining player WAR from the 2019 season (that was the last full season of data we have available) from ESPN.com

```{r}
page <- 'https://www.espn.com/mlb/war/leaders/_/type/seasonal/year/2019'
table <- page %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_nodes(css = 'table') %>%
  html_table(fill = TRUE)

table
```
